### broadcastSrcOp() {#a497ca5acebfbe31e76e7c05991519336}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void broadcastSrcOp (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/srcop">SrcOp</a> &gt; &amp; Ops, unsigned N, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp; Op)</>}
